unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch, students? Education ain't cheap these days, especially for courses like engineering or medicine. But chill, there's good news! Scholarship portals are popping up faster than samosas at IIT-Delhi's canteen during a fest.
normalised: Feeling the pinch, students? Education is not cheap these days, especially for courses like engineering or medicine. But chill, there is good news! Scholarship portals are popping up faster than samosas at I I T-Delhi's canteen during a fest.

unnormalised: These portals are basically digital goldmines, connecting deserving students like Rohan from Patna to scholarship opportunities they might otherwise miss. Think of them as online matchmaking for talent and funding! Sites like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are becoming super popular.
normalised: These portals are basically digital goldmines, connecting deserving students like Rohan from Patna to scholarship opportunities they might otherwise miss. Think of them as online matchmaking for talent and funding! Sites like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are becoming super popular.

unnormalised: Imagine Rohan, who aced his 10+2 exams on 12/03/2024, landing a scholarship that covers his fees at IIT-Bombay. That's the power of these portals! Just remember to apply before the deadlines – most close around 17:00 hrs on 31/07/2024.
normalised: Imagine Rohan, who aced his ten plus two exams on twelfth march two thousand and twenty four, landing a scholarship that covers his fees at I I T-Bombay. That is the power of these portals! Just remember to apply before the deadlines – most close around five P M on thirty first july two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: They’re not just for the academically brilliant either; many cater to specific categories (girls, minorities, etc.). Do your research! And remember to keep your documents ready – scanned copies of your Aadhar, marksheet, etc. You might even find something as specific as Rs. 50,000 to cover hostel fees near your college! The future of Indian education is looking bright, one scholarship at a time. Application season kicks off on 01/06/2024!
normalised: They are not just for the academically brilliant either; many cater to specific categories (girls, minorities, etcetera). Do your research! And remember to keep your documents ready – scanned copies of your Aadhar, marksheet, etcetera. You might even find something as specific as rupee fifty thousand to cover hostel fees near your college! The future of Indian education is looking bright, one scholarship at a time. Application season kicks off on first june two thousand and twenty four!
